findings.title: Losing tokenAmount due to Multiply After Divide
findings.description: In the calculation of tokenAmount, multiplying after division without proper method can cause precision loss, leading to a difference in tokenAmount.

findings.title: Multiple pragma directives have been found
Missing Zero Address Validation
findings.description: The functions transfer(), approve(), allowBuyingBoosters(), setSeedAndPresale(), and constructor() do not validate if the input addresses are zero.

findings.title: approve() race
findings.description: A widely-known racing condition in ERC20 implementation's approve function allows a spender to witness and alter the token owner's approval, enabling them to spend their entire approval amount twice.

findings.title: Missing Error Messages
findings.description: Error Messages can be added to the require checks so as to track down the errors.
